title: # 454 - Jared Freid & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Jared Freid. We talk about his new special, working out, drinking, bad customer service, Florida, The Bachelor and much more! 

 

Jared’s new stand up special “Socially Distanced...Of Course” is available now on YouTube right here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q7dxL8hPdbk 

 

This episode is brought to you by Sunday. Go to http://www.getsunday.com/bertcast to get $20 off your custom lawn plan at checkout!

 

This episode is also brought to you by Magic Spoon. Go to http://www.magicspoon.com/bert to grab the new limited edition Cookies & Cream, Maple Waffle, or a custom bundle of cereal to try it today! And be sure to use our promo code BERT at checkout to save five dollars off your order.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Tushy. Go to http://www.hellotushy.com/BERTCAST to get 10% off your order and FREE shipping

 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
